review_title: Unlesh Your Gaming Immortality with boAt Immortal 141 TWS Gaming Earbuds
review_description: As an avid gamer always on the lookout for top-notch audio gear, I recently invested in the boAt Immortal 141 TWS Gaming Earbuds, and I must say, they have exceeded my expectations in every aspect.
after using this for 7month i am writing this review In beast mode while playing bgmi there is no letency in sound but in normal mode when I play any video there is little letency in sound

I am no promoter of any brand. I gain anything from badmouthing any product. I had bought this product a month back. Out of two earbuds one has stopped working and the microphone of the other doesn‚Äôt work. The earphones automatically gets disconnected in every 5-10 minutes while using and then reconnects again which is very disturbing. I exercise in gym for 2 hrs everyday. Although this product claims to be water resistant. let me tell you by my experience. this disconnect and reconnect problem started with minimal exposure to sweat while running. So it is not gym friendly at all

Best performing earbuds. I purchased these earbuds from the sale under 1500 and i loved the quality of the sound. Even the mic of this earbud is so good and the voice and audio quality is so high !! Under 1500 this is the best buy
Fully Satisfied with this product. Value for money.
So there is very less charging power in both earbuds as there are many better options available in the competition but I loved the RGB and RGB is love üòÇ
The product quality was ok but not good for gym and workout
